column3: Paul has lived in Brazil {{c1::for}} ten years.
I'm tired of waiting. We've been sitting here {{c1::for}} an hour.
Kevin has been looking for a job {{c1::since}} he left school.
I haven't been to a party {{c1::for}} ages.
I wonder where Joe is. I haven't seen him {{c1::since}} last week.
Jane is away on holiday. She's been away {{c1::since}} Friday.
I've been doing the same job {{c1::for}} a long time.
This shop has been here {{c1::for}} more than 50 years.
